title: I\'d like to know if Caroline Goulding, the 16-year-old violinist you highlighted a while ago won in her category in the Grammy Awards.
text:
She didn't win. Here's a link with more information:

http://www.thetimesherald.com/article/20100201/NEWS01/2010305/1002/No-Grammy-is-no-problem-for-Goulding
